name: Switch them ON
description:
How to play?

Click on the switch to turn them on or off.

You need to turn on all the switches.

When you click on a switch, the switch to its right and the one to its left will be clicked automatically.

You should make the best moves, otherwise, your score will be decreased.

Credits:

Art from: https://pngtree.com/
